main event: A bright light was observed maneuvering in the sky in New York City, which varied in brightness and emitted a halo or glow effect.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 3 minutes,The object was first seen in the Central Park area at about 9:50 p.m.,The witness described it resembling a lighted aircraft light,Additional sketches were provided to illustrate the sighting,The witness speculated the object could be a reflection of sunlight on atmospheric molecules.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: The witness completed eleven and one-half grades of high school and is entering the junior year with an average of 92%.
